name: BEREAVE_FOL_INFO
description: This table contains information about your bereaved's follow-up record. These include bereaved record link, follow-up type, and follow-up form. The records included in this table are Bereavement Follow-Up (LHC) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bereavement follow-up record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The record status, such as active or soft-deleted.

columns.name: BEREAVED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bereaved record linked to this bereavement follow-up.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the contact in a patient record in which the bereavement follow-up was documented.

columns.name: FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the custom interface (SmartForm) record that is used to document the bereavement follow-up.

columns.name: FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: FORM_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of the custom interface (SmartForm) record that is used to document the bereavement follow-up.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Type of documentation in bereavement follow-up.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date the record was created

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the record was last locked/unlocked

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient associated with the bereaved.
